title: "Western New England University Debuts Oscar Sort Intuitive Trash Robot"
excerpt: "Western New England University (WNE) is the first U.S. institution of higher education to feature Oscar Sort, an AI-driven, intuitive, trash-sorting robot. This intuitive robot educates the campus community at the point of recycling and disposal and helps them to better understand how waste is measured,"
